answers.answer: Im 23+4 and thanx 2 God everything is going perfect with baby & me! How is ur pregnancy going?
Hey:) I'm 27w6d starting to feel big I'm having a girl:) and she's big and healthy!
22+4 with a baby boy! Scheduled for a csection April 8th, this is my 2nd child and all is great!

I'm 22+5 so far everything going good. I started feeling my little one at exactly 21 weeks she has her times when she wants to kick and some where she dont wanna do anything. Down fall is I'm always hungry. I'm due April 14 and needs to hurry up so we can meet our little girl :)
I'm 20w5d with a little girl! :) everything is going very good, I've had an easy pregnancy so far (I hope I don't jinx it).
In 24+1 with a boy and feeling great. He's constantly moving which I love and I've had no problems with my pregnancy.
we are 21 weeks with a littl girl so far everything looks good and great heartbeat!!!!  i havent felt much movement just little flutters here and there.
28+4 with a boy. High risk so I have weekly appointments already. Baby is small but doing well.

Im 20 weeks. With a beautiful healthy girl. I'm a first time mom and have had all the symptoms. Still morning sickness. And just was diagnosed with gestational diabetes. But anything for princess! Due april28- may 6
26 weeks today with baby girl... :) pregnancy has been good she is healthy and kicking.. Ready to see her March 23
I'm 22+3 wks & expecting my 3rd boy! Definately still feeling 'morning' sick but not as badly.. just tired all the time!!
how come your on high risk if you dont mind me asking
27 weeks with a healthy boy!! But might be bed rested by 30 weeks. Ftm(:
Im 22 weeks ive been feeling good had a few cramps other then that good how bout u?
23+3 weeks and carrying a perfectly healthy LARGE baby girl... Just found out she's in the 92nd percentile and am terrified she's gonna be a 10lber lol!

Im 22w today! We are having a little girl! So excited! Besides horrible morning sickness that lasted 4 months, im finally feeling better and our little girl is as healthy as can be :) im due April 22nd!

i am 18 weeks and ive had my ups and downs. this pregnancy is alot harder than when i was pregnant with my daughter. i get sore if im up and about for more than a lil while, back aches already, had bad morning sickness, migraines, was put on bedrest for 2 weeks in november and released thanks to GOD. baby is great go back in 2 weeks im having a boy.

I'm 21 weeks with a baby girl who thoroughly loves to use my bladder as her personal foot cushion. Lol. I'm having a few issues with gestational diabetes, carpal tunnel issues and migraines, but other than that everything's going great. My baby is quite the acrobat, she moves all throughout the day (and night). I'm due April 29th and I can't wait!  :-)

question: looking to hear from other mommys that are around 20 weeks and hear there story!!!!! hope all is going well with baby!
title: MOMMYS AROUND  WEEKS
